body:
Comment 13 by **simonedichiara@maior.biz**: 
The error in the preceding posts happens only when I use "go install -x
code.google.com/p/go-tour/gotour".
It doesn't happen if I use "C:\Go\src\pkg\code.google.com\p\go-tour\gotour>go build -v".
Attachments: 1. compile_test_go_tour_good_print.JPG (32074 bytes)
